Package dev.kkorolyov.sqlob.logging

Class Logger

  • java.lang.Object
    • dev.kkorolyov.sqlob.logging.Logger

  • public class Logger
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides the appropriate logger or a stub depending on the existence of the SimpleLogs library during runtime.
